name: Elevator Goes Up? (LD48)
description:
Welcome to the secret laboratory Elevator Incorporated, the number one elevator testing site. Here, you can send an elevator flying into space, or crashing into the ground - in the name of science, of course! And uncover secrets on the way.

Because we know that what goes up, must come down.

Resources
Sound & Art is original

Fira Mono, Google Fonts

Poppins, accessed from Google Fonts

Made solo by Kevin G for Ludum Dare 48
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/elevator-goes-up/
